title: FaceHack
description: FaceHack 2017 is the signature Artificial Intelligence hackathon in Malaysia, bringing 100 students and tech enthusiasts together from various local universities to learn about the current state of the art in Face Technology, one of the prominent areas in Artificial Intelligence, and its future by competing in a 48-hour hackathon format.
body:
FaceHack 2017 is the signature Artificial Intelligence hackathon in Malaysia, bringing 100 students and tech enthusiasts together from various local universities to learn about the current state of the art in Face Technology, one of the prominent areas in Artificial Intelligence, and its future by competing in a 48-hour hackathon format.

[Ticket](https://face2017.peatix.com/)
